If you like a semi fast pase intense spine chilling online horror game, this one is for you.

Fun game. Even more fun with friends. Can be pretty scary at first and then gets really fun and strategic as you get better. Different killers, teammates, loadouts, and maps makes for a lot of replayablilty. Can play in online matchmaking or make a lobby to play with friends.
A true horror experience, but it can also turn out to be one of the best multiplayer games you've played. The plot matters little, just surviving or killing

It is a very fun, fast paced, third and first person game. Being a survivor is fun and always entertaining with a rush of adrenaline, but being a killer is the best if you are more experienced. This game never got old for me, even after 100 hours of playtime. Unfortunately, there are some minor bugs and lagginess within the game, but waiting will generally get through it. All in all, Dead by Daylight is a great game for people who don't mind a little bit of a scare.
J'aime clairement tout dans ce jeu, seulement 2 jours que je l'ai et je suis d√©j√† accro ! :D

I enjoyed it very much. 

At first look, I thought it would be tedious to see the 4 v 1 situation sort of like Evolve 2. However, I find the level up system and the item hoarding portion fun. 

The killer queue could do some work, often times it's around 2mins - 15mins or none at all depending on what time of day you are playing. 

Survivors rage quitting only offers a poor offering of 600 blood points and the punishment for the player is simply no blood point for that match so i've come to believed as I have yet to rq a game. 

I would say that this game is worth it's money as the saying goes 1 hr = 1 dollar in a gameplay timer.

each new character provides new ways to attach ur perk system and playstyle as they each bring in different sets of perks.
DBD never gets old, always terrifies, and never fails to excite. I've yet to love a game this much that is this dynamic in a long time. MANY KUDOS
this is game is so amazing your whole family should get it

Archives ruined the game for 2 months. promoting unusual play and absolutely annoying when you cant get them done. I paid for the stupid pass as well, and ill only get half of its value because i cant commit enough hours to the game to unlock everything.

The game needs a way to see what will be quicker to queue as. 5+ minutes to queue for killer, get into a game, someone quits and its back to the queue. it'd be nice to see whats needed so you can actually get into a game quicker.
the best game for play whit friends <3

The developer has fixed the issues I had when I first played this game which could be game breaking at times. They also added a nice tutorial which gives a better sense of the game play. Look forward to upcoming releases.

there's a lot of ups and down moments in this game, but overall is still fun
